pullrequest.title: Feature System Part 7: Features for programmatic construction of objects

content.raw: The issue is that `world->addSkeleton` is called [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/src/de6ea31e2870a4f020eefe0ae3abc161204d3f16/dartsim/src/Base.hh#lines-181) before the skeleton is populated with collision shapes. `addSkeleton` is responsible for adding collision shapes to DARTs collision checker, and I don't think there is a way to update the collision checker after this call. We should be able to fix the failing test since it's using `ConstructWorld` and passing in a whole `SDF:World`, but this poses a problem if we're trying to add links and their collisions incrementally. Maybe we can add a \`Model::Finalize\` or something similar?
content.html: The issue is that world->addSkeleton is called here before the skeleton is populated with collision shapes. addSkeleton is responsible for adding collision shapes to DARTs collision checker, and I don't think there is a way to update the collision checker after this call. We should be able to fix the failing test since it's using ConstructWorld and passing in a whole SDF:World, but this poses a problem if we're trying to add links and their collisions incrementally. Maybe we can add a `Model::Finalize` or something similar?
